text: I'm trying to play with caching the registry in GitHub Actions, especially on Windows, but the cache is a tarball, so now instead of julia taking forever to clone the repository I have GitHub taking forever to unpack a tarball on Windows.  looks like a good trade-off

elements.text: I'm trying to play with caching the registry in GitHub Actions, especially on Windows, but the cache is a tarball, so now instead of julia taking forever to clone the repository I have GitHub taking forever to unpack a tarball on Windows.  looks like a good trade-off

text: I wanted to build Julia in a job and then save it as artifact to be used in later jobs. The cache was somehow slower than rebuilding it from scratch in each job :face_palm:

elements.text: I wanted to build Julia in a job and then save it as artifact to be used in later jobs. The cache was somehow slower than rebuilding it from scratch in each job

text: Their caching needs a lot of work unfortunately
